name: 王賢達
objective: 內容包括高分子聚合反應，高分子結構及其物理性質。並包含高分子的鑑定。就橡膠、塑膠、纖維，由結構、性質、用途、產品，做比較和說明。
schedule:
1. Introduction to polymer science(1/2 wk)
2. Polymer structure(morphology)(2 wks)
3. Molecular weight of polymers(2 1/2 wks)
4. Step-reaction polymerization or polycondensation reactions(2 wks)
5. Ionic chain-reaction and complex coordinative polymerization
    (addition polymerization)(2 wks)
6. Mid-term exam(1 wk) 
7. Free radical chain polymerization(addition polymerization)(2 1/2 wks)
8. Copolymerization(11/2 wks)
9. Spectrometric characterization of polymers (1 wk)
10. Additives (1/2 wk)
11. Reactions on polymers (1/2 wk)
12. Final exam(1 wk)
scorePolicy:
Homework and attendance(30%)
Mid-term exam(30%)
Final exam(40%)
materials: Polymer Chemistry (Charles E. Carraher, Jr.) 7th ed.
